ch.epfl.alpano

Interface Distance


  • public interface Distance
    This class allows for the conversion of distances to angles, and angles to distances. All distances are measured on earth's surface. The angle is representative of the angle that would be measured at the center of the earth between the 2 points which the distance is measured.
    Author:
    Martin Cibils (261746), Jeremy Mion (261178)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double EARTH_RADIUS
      The radius of the earth.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double toMeters(double distanceInRadians)
      Converts an angle which is measured from the center of the earth between 2 points on earth's surface to the distance that separates them.
      static double toRadians(double distanceInMeters)
      Converts the distance (measured on earths surface) between 2 points to the angle (radiant).

    • Field Detail

      • EARTH_RADIUS

        static final double EARTH_RADIUS
        The radius of the earth.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • toRadians

        static double toRadians(double distanceInMeters)
        Converts the distance (measured on earths surface) between 2 points to the angle (radiant).

        This angle can be measured as the angle between the 2 points in the perspective of the center of the earth. This is the reverse operation of toMeters.

        Parameters:
        distanceInMeters - The most direct distance between two points on earth. Distance measured on earths surface.
        Returns:
        The angle between the 2 points in the perspective of the center of the earth.

      • toMeters

        static double toMeters(double distanceInRadians)
        Converts an angle which is measured from the center of the earth between 2 points on earth's surface to the distance that separates them. The distance is measured on earths surface (curve).
        Parameters:
        distanceInRadians - Measure of the angle in radiant to be converted to a distance.
        Returns:
        The distance that separates the 2 points on earth that have distanceInRadians between them.
